Articles.Content:
Hello, this Forum is awesome. I registered in one purpose ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) i can\'t find custom Launch pad, and im shure i saw one here in plugin section. My spacecrafts are too big for stock one.

P.S. Latest save game

![1rsrv](http://www.freeimagehosting.net/1rsrv)

Link: [http://www.freeimagehosting.net/1rsrv](http://www.freeimagehosting.net/1rsrv)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
